posts.post_content: Hi, I'm looking to buy a T206 Honus Wagner baseballs card. I don't really mind if you have one that doesn't look too good (most don't because of age). I have several hundred dollars to spend on this--yes I know that's alot for a piece of cardboard--but he has sentimental and not resale value to me :)

Sorry. I'd really like to help you out but I only sell that
card in bulk.
:) Well, ok then, I'll buy them all if that's what it takes...

this guy has two for one on craigslist....


[url]http://vancouver.en.craigslist.ca/van/clt/1708233357.html[/url]
Buying a honus wagner for $200 is the quickest surest way to lose $200 :)

but it has the super rare , almost non existent, polar bear back!  he even says it is authentic!    It is a great find ,the only polar bear back Wagner and its on craigslist......

lol
